channel.title: CVE Feed for Microsoft -- Microsoft Outlook for Android
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Microsoft -- Microsoft Outlook for Android

item.title: CVE-2019-1460|2024-08-04T18:20:28.315Z -- microsoft -- microsoft%20outlook%20for%20android
item.description: A spoofing vulnerability exists in the way Microsoft Outlook for Android software parses specifically crafted email messages, aka 'Outlook for Android Spoofing Vulnerability'.

item.description: A spoofing vulnerability exists in the way Microsoft Outlook for Android software parses specifically crafted email messages, aka 'Outlook for Android Spoofing Vulnerability'.
